A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think I just watched Space Balls\, the Search for More Money!   This movie jumped the shark and nuked the fridge\, all in a mere 2 hrs and 40 long minutes.  Luke joking around with the Force with Rey?  Leia's resurrection?  Porgs?  And no real answers to all of the questions asked in Force Awakens.  The more I think about what I just watched the more mad I get.  Fire Rian Johnson and bring back Gareth Edwards.
